MCP Payment Wrapper

Payment wrapper for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that adds payment verification and billing functionality

userToken?

optional userToken: string

Defined in: payment-wrapper.ts:44

User JWT token for identifying and authenticating the end user If not provided, the wrapper will return authentication-required responses
